mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (project_no, project_title, project_description, project_start_date, project_end_Date, project_status, color) VALUES (#{project_no}, #{project_title}, #{project_description}, #{project_start_date}, #{project_end_Date}, 0, "#1ABC9C")
INSERT INTO project_member (member_no, project_no, member_position) VALUES (#{member_no}, #{project_no}, 0)

mapper.select: SELECT p.project_no, p.project_title, p.project_start_date, p.project_end_date, p.project_status, m.member_no FROM project p JOIN project_member pm ON p.project_no = pm.project_no JOIN member m ON m.member_no = pm.member_no WHERE m.member_no = #{member_no}
